net.big_oh.hibernate
Interface StateOrientedDAO<T,ID extends java.io.Serializable>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the persistent domain object.
ID - The persistent domain object's key type.
All Known Implementing Classes:
HibernateDAO
public interface StateOrientedDAO<T,ID extends java.io.Serializable>

A top-level interface for DAOs that support state-oriented operations, such as Hibernate.

Version:
Oct 11, 2009
